author: perezhilton
title: Holy Shit, Donald Trump Makes Get Out 100x Scarier!
text:
What could make the racially charged scary movie Get Out even more terrifying?
Donald Trump !
Funny or Die made a mashup spoof of Jordan Peele 's horror hit with the REAL horror of our POTUS. And it is next level!
Related: White Supremacists Take College Campus Recruitment To 'Unprecedented' Levels 
See Ivanka Trump , Kanye West , and even Jeff Sessions scare the crap out of every black person in America!
Get trapped in the sunken place that is the next four years (below)! 

. @JordanPeele 's Horror film "Get Out" meets the only thing that could make meeting the parents even scarier, President Donald Trump. pic.twitter.com/FLylMad3H5 
â€” Funny Or Die (@funnyordie) March 6, 2017
